remarks:
Introduce an explicit substitution into an implicit substitution hypothesis.  See also ~ csbhypf .  (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Apr-2004.) 

---

 Introduce an explicit substitution into an implicit substitution hypothesis.  See also csbhypf .  (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Apr-2004.)
statement:
sbhypf.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
sbhypf.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbhypf $p |- ( y = A -> ( [ y / x ] ph <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d x y $.
